description: This file defines interfaces, data classes, and mock implementations related to content, metadata, assets, and rating repositories for a media application. It provides a structured way to access content metadata, app configuration, assets, and user interactions such as likes, primarily for use in the rating overlay and content screens.

classes.name: ContentRepository
classes.description: Interface for fetching content metadata such as home sections and content info.

classes.name: MetadataRepository
classes.description: Interface for fetching app copy, labels, and configuration metadata.

classes.name: AssetsRepository
classes.description: Interface for accessing local asset paths or URLs for images.

classes.name: RatingRepository
classes.description: Interface for managing like/liked states for content.

classes.name: IndiceCopy
classes.description: Data class holding various textual content for the index or overview screen.

classes.name: InstructionImages
classes.description: Data class holding paths to instruction-related images.

classes.name: ContentInfo
classes.description: Data class representing minimal content information for overlay display.

classes.name: VodRatingSettings
classes.description: Data class for rating overlay display settings and rolling credits timing.

classes.name: MockContentRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of ContentRepository returning static data.

classes.name: MockMetadataRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of MetadataRepository returning static app metadata.

classes.name: MockAssetsRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of AssetsRepository returning static asset paths.

classes.name: MockRatingRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of RatingRepository managing in-memory like states.

methods.name: getHomeSections
methods.description: Fetches a list of home section names.

methods.name: getContentInfo
methods.description: Retrieves minimal content info for a given content ID.

methods.name: getIndiceCopy
methods.description: Fetches app copy and labels for the index screen.

methods.name: isLiked
methods.description: Checks if a content item is liked.

methods.name: setLike
methods.description: Sets the liked state for a content item.
